parameters.name: Manifest File
parameters.help_text: Annotation manifest (1 row per recording) paring annotated probe tracks with recording data.

parameters.name: neuroglancer file
parameters.help_text: Json file with probe annotations from neuroglancer

parameters.name: update_packages_from_source
parameters.description: Always use the latest commit of github repo
parameters.help_text: If 1, every run will install a python package from source repo https://github.com/AllenNeuralDynamics/aind-ephys-ibl-gui-conversion at HEAD on main
